1: -module(basic_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([all/0]).
    4: -export([test1/1, test2/1]).
    5: 
    6: all() -> [test1, test2].
    7: 
    8: test1(Config) -> 
    9:     io:format("Config contains: ~p~n", [Config]),
   10:     1 = 1.
   11: 
   12: test2(_Config) ->
   13:     A = 0,
   14:     1/A.
